page.title: 01Witney,Oxfordshire.
page.content: Witney has a population of 25,000 includng the surrounding villages which are Hailey,Crawley and Minster Lovell. It is 13 miles WSW of Oxford (APROX).There are about 150 shops in Bridge Street,High Street,Market Street,Corn Street and Welch Way. Witney has about nine churches of different religions,a fire station,a police station and two health centres.The river Windrush runs through Witney gradually running into the Thames.Witney also has its own hospital,old peoples home,around eight schools and two public car parks.Witney has been in the centre of the blanket making industry for hundreds of years but there is now only one mill left.
